publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5998 James Kelly: Congratulations to the Oakwood Nursery Council in Securing an Awards for All Scotland Grant—That the Parliament notes the announcement that the Oakwood Nursery Council has been successful in securing a funding grant of £8,000 from the Big Lottery Fund Awards for All Scotland to create an eco-garden for the creative use of the children attending Oakwood House Nursery, children from other local nurseries and elderly residents of a local care home and congratulates all members of the Oakwood Nursery Council for their excellent contribution to the local community.

S3M-5998 James Kelly: Congratulations to the Oakwood Nursery Council in Securing an Awards for All Scotland Grant—That the Parliament notes the announcement that the Oakwood Nursery Council has been successful in securing a funding grant of £8,000 from the Big Lottery Fund Awards for All Scotland to create an eco-garden for the creative use of the children attending Oakwood House Nursery, children from other local nurseries and elderly residents of a local care home and congratulates all members of the Oakwood Nursery Council for their excellent contribution to the local community.
S3M-5998 Congratulations to the Oakwood Nursery Council in Securing an Awards for All Scotland Grant (lodged on 18 March 2010) Paul Martin*, Jackie Baillie*, Trish Godman*
S3M-5998 Congratulations to the Oakwood Nursery Council in Securing an Awards for All Scotland Grant (lodged on 18 March 2010) Mr Frank McAveety*, Mary Mulligan*, Robin Harper*, Sarah Boyack*
S3M-5998 Congratulations to the Oakwood Nursery Council in Securing an Awards for All Scotland Grant (lodged on 18 March 2010) Hugh Henry*
S3M-5998 Congratulations to the Oakwood Nursery Council in Securing an Awards for All Scotland Grant (lodged on 18 March 2010) Angela Constance*
